# Alban Istrefi
> Personal blog about AI, product, and modern web development.

## Site
- URL: https://www.albanistrefi.me
- Language: en
- RSS: https://www.albanistrefi.me/rss.xml
- Atom: https://www.albanistrefi.me/atom.xml
- Sitemap: https://www.albanistrefi.me/sitemap-index.xml

## Key Pages
- https://www.albanistrefi.me/
- https://www.albanistrefi.me/writing/
- https://www.albanistrefi.me/about/
- https://www.albanistrefi.me/search/

## Content
- Blog posts live under https://www.albanistrefi.me/writing/
- Each post includes title, description, publish date, and tags.
- Markdown versions are available at the same URL with `.md` appended.

## Attribution
- Please attribute to "Alban Istrefi" and link to the source page.
